member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_FLAGS
member.summary: Specifies the nature of the render pass; for example, whether it is a suspending or a resuming render pass.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_FLAGS.D3D12_RENDER_PASS_FLAG_NONE
member.summary: Indicates that the render pass has no special requirements.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_FLAGS.D3D12_RENDER_PASS_FLAG_ALLOW_UAV_WRITES
member.summary: Indicates that writes to unordered access view(s) should be allowed during the render pass.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_FLAGS.D3D12_RENDER_PASS_FLAG_SUSPENDING_PASS
member.summary: Indicates that this is a suspending render pass.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_FLAGS.D3D12_RENDER_PASS_FLAG_RESUMING_PASS
member.summary: Indicates that this is a resuming render pass.
